JobFullDesc:
MURAL is on a mission to inspire and connect imagination workers globally.
MURAL is a digital workspace for visual collaboration that connects over 75 percent of the Fortune 100. Teams at global enterprises including IBM, USAA, E-Trade, Intuit, SAP, Atlassian, Autodesk, and GitHub embrace visual collaboration to run more productive meetings and workshops. This leads to a more creative, engaging, and fun way of working together, all in a welcoming, simple-to-use online space.
Headquartered in San Francisco, California, MURAL employs over 500 people around the world. In 2020, MURAL raised $118M in a series B round of financing and are working hard to take MURAL to the next level.YOUR MISSION
We believe that undergraduate and graduate students represent the next generation of imagination workers. The MURAL Imagination Student Program is a new opportunity for students to act as liaisons between MURAL and their universities, growing awareness and adoption of MURAL as the go-to digital workspace for visual collaboration. We are looking for our next group of students to fill our Fall 2021 cohort of student ambassadors.
You will: 

Co-Lead outreach efforts on your campus, driving awareness, new workspace creation and collaboration among students 
Organize monthly events & workshops- virtually or on campus
Coordinate campus “MURAL Transformer Talks” with leaders from the business world who are transforming their company cultures through visual collaboration
Participate in ambassador check-ins with MURAL leadership
Attend annual virtual MURAL Imagination Student Fall Kickoff in early September
Engage in social media and the new MURAL Student Community group 
Receive Awesome MURAL Swag
Additional bonus opportunity for exceptional performance
After your first 6 successful months as an ambassador, we convert your MURAL workspace for free 10 years

YOUR PROFILE
The ideal candidate will have the following characteristics:

Currently enrolled Undergraduate or Graduate US student.
Preferred (but not required) undergraduate programs include: Business / Economics, Product Design or Engineering major 
Preferred (but not required) graduate programs: MBA, Design or Engineering
Career interests include Entrepreneurship, Product Management, Design, Management Consulting
Highly Engaged in campus life (leadership in clubs, organizations)
Have already used MURAL (in class and see its potential)
A strong communicator and writer and embrace multitasking.
Goal oriented, clear prioritization, and maintains focus when it comes to deadlines.

This is a part-time and paid position.*
#LI-Remote #LI-CR

In addition to being part of our quest to help people empower their imagination, we offer:

Competitive salary and benefits
Flexible working hours

Flexible time off
Professional development opportunities
Learning stipend
Wellness stipend
MURAL free forever plan
Design Thinking + Facilitation trainings

OUR VALUES
We bring people to our team that care about our mission to inspire and connect creative people globally, and who feel aligned with our values:

Make others successful
Adapt to thrive
Play to wow
Think global
Experiment like an owner

Practicing equality through imagination work.
MURAL is committed to creating diverse and inclusive workspaces where people can make a positive impact on the world and share their vision of how they achieve it. We are dedicated to working alongside multiple communities to help build this dream and bring it to life.
